hello: This is the place where you can customize your experience with league's client!
description: All of the fields are optional, so if you want to explore - press the start and enjoy choosing and banning champions from this legendary game

allPlayers.q: Do you want to choose for all of the players or just one?

move.q: By default you have 60s for a move, do you want to change this number?
move.followUp: How much time do you need for a move?

banningPhase.q: Do you want to have banning phase?
banningPhase.followUp: How much champions do you want to be banned for each team? (0-5)

playersCount.q: By default there is 10 players - do you want to customize this number?
followUp: How much friendly players do you want to have? (0-5)
How much enemy players do you want to have? (0-5)
